code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{addItem}from"../../redux/shoppingListSlice";import{Form,Button,Container}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItemForm=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const[name,setName]=useState("");const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(name&&quantity){dispatch(addItem({name,quantity:parseInt(quantity)}));setName("");setQuantity("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 bg-dark rounded border border-light",style:{maxWidth:"400px",width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"itemName",className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{className:"text-light",children:"Item Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter item name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),className:"bg-dark text-light"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{controlId:"itemQuantity",className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{className:"text-light",children:"Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"number",placeholder:"Enter quantity",value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(e.target.value),className:"bg-dark text-light"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"success",type:"submit",className:"btn-lg mt-3",children:"Add Item"})})]})})});};export default ItemForm;
